feed.title: Will Guillou
feed.subtitle: I am a student at The Village School. Manager and Writer at guilloutran.com. I enjoy coding and reading in my free time!.

entry.title: Hello World!
entry.content:
Welcome everybody to my personal blog! My name is Nghia but my pen name and future change name is Will. I’m a high school freshman and a part-time Full Stack Developer(unofficial, duh!). I enjoy reading and coding. In this blog, I write about my life, philosophy, ocassionally I also write about book and coding. I will also try to write some simple to understand or at least I think is simple tutorial about coding and how-to stuff. I hope you guys will enjoy reading my blog and found it interesting.

Quote: “Where there is a will, there is a way”

I end here :)

entry.title: How to create a Raspberry Pi Chat Server!

link.title: How to create a Raspberry Pi Chat Server!

entry.content:
Introduction:

In this tutorial, you’ll learn how to create a Raspberry Pi Chat Server with Rocket Chat. You will also learn how to create a reverse proxy so that you can use your domain and share your chat server with your friend!

Requirement:

  • A Raspberry Pi 4+ (You can also use 3+ or alternative)
  • A SD Card with Rapsbian Buster
  • A minimal knowledge of Linux
